resources.string: Delivered within 20 minutes within KU, for other areas our agent will be in contact shortly to make your delivery
The agent will call you immediately the order is made and make the delivery from our warehouse. If you chose GPS, We can get your location and come to you wherever you are provided you stay there
All our products come with a one year warranty
Enter your details below to start your unique Online shopping delivery experience,
This app enables users shop easily and conveniently at the cheapest price

Go to the main menu and scroll to shop. Click an item to select. On the next page click buy or scroll down to view all item details. When your sure click BUY then click the cart icon to view your cart. You can add, delete or update your cart before clicking FINISH to proceed with your order

We deliver fast and for cheap using top grade algorithms to fasten our delivery timelines. For areas around KU we deliver insanty within 10 to 20 minutes to all hostels. Areas around kahawa,Ruiru we deliver in 20 minutes. We deliver fast food in clean heated mobile microwaves so that you enjoy hot food like you never left the kitche, Our liqour is top grade and cheaper than bars. All this within the nectar app
